faqs.a1: An AI Skill is a modular capability that can be added to AI assistants to enhance their functionality in specific areas.
faqs.q2: How do I create a skill?
faqs.a2: You can create a skill by clicking 'Submit Skill' in the navigation bar and filling out the form with your skill's details.
faqs.q3: How do I submit a skill?
faqs.a3: After creating your skill, click 'Submit Skill', fill in the required information, and submit for review.
faqs.q4: What are the file size limits?
faqs.a4: Individual skill packages should not exceed 10MB. If you need more space, consider splitting into multiple skills.
faqs.q5: How do I use a skill?
faqs.a5: Download the skill package, follow the installation instructions, and configure it according to the documentation.
faqs.q6: Can I update my submitted skill?
faqs.a6: Yes, you can update your skills at any time through your profile page.
